activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9122
activity.text:
Hi @nihal467, @Jacobjeevan,  

This issue has been stagnant for 2 weeks. Can I take over?  

My approach:  
- [x] Stop auto-scrolling at the staff capacity section instead of the page top.  
- [x] Display total staff capacity for the entire section using the `total_doctor` value in the API response to avoid extra API calls.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/698d07f5-f4d9-4658-8008-45d8c6726f1e
